name: Can you survive this?
description:
(Disclaimer: The game is still in development)  Destiro games

We are small game development studio with 2 programmers and 1 artist. Our main goal is to finish "Can you survive this?" ,while having fun and telling how much we hate game development, because Unity doesn't like us sometimes. 

What is the game about?

Meet Bob - the most sexy man in this galaxy.  Are you jealous of him? Don't be! Because you can become Bob today!

Can you survive this  is  a 2D multiplayer game (for now only LAN party), about surviving a minigame each round and beating your friends' bottoms. For playing you need atleast 2 players, so bring your friend and try it out!

Community 

 Join our Discord server and don't miss any update on the game
